name: Hexland
tagline: Hexagonal Go inspirated game in Python-Kivy
body:
### Hexland

Hexland is a game in development, inside my Final Degree Project at Universitat Aut√≤noma de Barcelona.

You can test the Android version at https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.afibanez.hexland, or grab the sourcecode and run it on Windows/Mac/Linux (but requires [Kivy](http://www.kivy.org) installed).

Please, let my feedback of the game in this little poll: http://goo.gl/forms/2CBp5G4jBG (in Catalan) or in the Google Play comments.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
